def_cn: 尽力同时应付；尽量兼顾
def_en: If you juggle lots of different things, for example your work and your family, you try to give enough time or attention to all of them.

def_cn: 玩杂耍（指连续向空中抛接多个物体）
def_en: If you juggle, you entertain people by throwing things into the air, catching each one and throwing it up again so that there are several of them in the air at the same time.
